TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICodeCompiler

summary.span: 定义用于调用源代码编译的接口或使用指定编译器的 CodeDOM 树。

span.span: Defines an interface for invoking compilation of source code or a CodeDOM tree using a specific compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 中，代码提供程序包含的实现， ， ，和。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, code providers consist of implementations of , , , and . 中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，则， ，和方法已过时，和的方法并中可直接使用类。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the , , and methods are obsolete, and the methods of and are directly available in the class. 应在代码提供程序实现中重写这些方法，并调用基方法。You should override those methods in your code provider implementation and not call the base methods. 接口可以实现特定的编译器将使开发人员能够以编程方式编译代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM) 编译单元，将包含源代码的字符串中的程序集或源代码文件。The interface can be implemented for a specific compiler to enable developers to programmatically compile assemblies from Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) compile units, strings containing source code, or source code files. 接口提供了调用具有指定参数在运行时和访问相关的信息到编译后进行编译，包括结果代码和任何错误或警告，编译器返回编译的能力。The interface provides the capability to invoke compilation with specified parameters at runtime and access information related to compilation after compilation occurs, including the result code, and any errors or warnings the compiler returns. 每个编译方法接受对象，指示编译器，设置并返回对象，它指示编译的结果。Each compile method accepts a object that indicates settings for the compiler, and returns a object that indicates the results of the compilation. 编译器开发人员应提供此接口以支持动态编译的实现。Compiler developers should provide an implementation of this interface to support dynamic compilation. 实施者还应考虑实现此接口可提供以编程方式编译功能的语言所提供的 CodeDom 支持的。 implementers should also consider implementing this interface to provide programmatic compilation capability for the language that they are providing CodeDom support for.

permission.span: 对于直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的代码不能使用此接口。

span.span: This interface cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 继承者完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 实现此接口的类不能继承部分受信任的代码。

span.span: Classes that implement this interface cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

A that indicates the code to compile.

returns.span: 指示编译结果的 对象。

span.span: A object that indicates the results of compilation.
